title: Early 20th Century Russian Type
content:
Does anyone know of a good source of information for early 20th century Russian type?

Thanks!

Daniel
author: Shrdlu

comments.content:
For examples of pre-revolutionary typography (before 1917)  
 [http://englishrussia.com/?p=2203](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020185846/http:/englishrussia.com/?p=2203 "http://englishrussia.com/?p=2203")

For avant-garde designs (before the 30's)you can a look at some works by Lissitzky, Rodchenko and Stepanova.

There are a few excellent books with examples of popular typefaces, but they are mostly in Russian.  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Personal Art and Design Portal of Ivan Gulkov  
 [www.ivangdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020185846/http:/www.ivangdesign.com/ "www.ivangdesign.com")
